English: Returning to Everon
In the morning, northern Everon
FORWARD, COMRADES! FOR THE SOVIET UNION, ATTACK!
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY HAS SEVERAL ANTI-AIR GUNS AROUND THE AIRPORT. ONCE YOU GET THERE, TAKE CARE OF THEM, OTHERWISE ULYANA WON'T BE ABLE TO SUPPORT YOU FROM THE AIR. BAZA OUT.
WE'VE BROKEN THEIR LINE OF DEFENCE. CONTINUE TO THE VILLAGE AND SEIZE IT.
SAINT PHILLIPPE IS OURS, COMRADES. TO ALL UNITS, ASSUME DEFENSIVE POSITIONS AND GET READY FOR ENEMY COUNTERATTACKS. I'M TAKING LEONID TO THE EAST.
LEONID TO IVAN, WE'VE TAKEN SAINT PHILLIPPE, GET READY TO STRIKE AT THE BASE, OVER.
IVAN TO LEONID, WE'RE APPROACHING FROM THE SOUTH. GIVE US THE SIGNAL AND WE'LL ATTACK. OUT.
LEONID TO IVAN, TIME TO GO IN. WEAPONS FREE, OVER.
SEE YOU IN THE BASE, LEONID. OUT.
column5: COME IN HERE AND GET US TO THE AIRPORT. OVER."

English: TATYANA IS ON THE WAY. REARM YOURSELVES, LEONID, WE DON'T HAVE ANY WEAPONS FOR YOU. WE DO HAVE SOME REINFORCEMENTS THOUGH, IF YOU NEED THEM. WE'LL BE THERE SHORTLY. OUT.
THE CAVALRY IS HERE FOR YOU, LEONID. GET IN AND GIVE THE SIGNAL TO GO WHENEVER YOU'RE READY.
LEONID TO TATYANA, FORWARD. ONWARDS TO THE AIRPORT.
LEONID TO ULYANA, YELENA AND FYODOR, GET READY, WE'RE ADVANCING FROM THE SOUTH TOWARDS THE AIRPORT. OUR ATTACK SHALL BEGIN SHORTLY. OUT.
ULYANA TO LEONID, DO NOT FORGET ABOUT THE ANTI-AIR GUNS. WE CANNOT RISK COMING NEAR THE AIRPORT UNTIL YOU DEAL WITH THEM. OUT.
YELENA TO LEONID, WE'VE SECURED A BEACHHEAD. READY TO ADVANCE ON YOUR SIGNAL. OUT.
FYODOR TO LEONID, WE'RE ENGAGING THE ENEMY AT THE CHAPEL. WE SHOULD BE READY IN TIME FOR YOUR SIGNAL. OUT.
LEONID TO YELENA, FYODOR AND TATYANA, IT IS TIME TO TAKE THE AIRPORT. ONWARDS! OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ALL ANTI-AIR GUNS AT THE AIRPORT WERE NEUTRALIZED. ULYANA IS NOW JOINING IN ON THE ATTACK. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED, THE AIRPORT IS OURS. THE RECONQUEST OF EVERON HAS BEGUN AND YOU DID YOUR PART. GOOD WORK, EVERYONE. BAZA OUT.
Ivan
Tatyana
Konstantin
Anton
Boris
